channel.title: Divine Revolution 317 - Unique, 25 Skills, Bosses, Eco!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://images.cooltext.com/3604351.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=3][IMG]http://i918.photobucket.com/albums/ad28/Tomb1443/Notorious%20Advertisement%20Pictures/icon_homepage_zpsfcc29152.png[/img] Website: [URL=http://"http://www.divinerevolution317.com"]Click Here[/URL].[/SIZE][/B] [B][SIZE=3][IMG]http://i918.photobucket.com/albums/ad28/Tomb1443/Notorious%20Advertisement%20Pictures/play_zps82372811.gif[/img] Webclient:[URL=http://"http://www.divinerevolution317.com/webclient"] Click Here[/URL].[/SIZE][/B][/CENTER]
[B][SIZE=2][COLOR="#009900"]Something about us:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B] Divine Revolution wasn't built just to be a great server, we mainly focus on our community. A server can be well coded but without that special spark with the owner and his players whats the point? At Divine Revolution we ensure that our staff is on daily and seeing how our players are enjoying the server. Feel free to come on over to our server and check us out, hell you might even enjoy your stay! :D
[HR][/HR]
[SIZE=2][B][COLOR="#009900"]Server Features:[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE]
[ul][*]Economy / PvP / PvM [*]Enjoyable Community / Friendly Owners [*]Built for a community not for money! [*]25 Working Skills - Including Construction, Summoning, and Dungeoneering. [*]Almost perfect combat system [*]Unique content and Custom Zones [*]12+ Hard Bosses (Many Drops) [*]Almost perfect skilling xp rates [*]In-Game Highscores [*]Server updates on the daily (Try to avoid game interruptions with to many) [*]Full Screen and perfect F keys [*]Dicing and a Gamblers Zone [*]Coded Easter Ring/Ring of Stone/Scythe/Sleds [*]Completionist Cape - Emote added [*]Many minigames including Dueling Arena (Staking) & Mage Bank. [*]Alot of content much more will be added with player requests... [*]G Maul Spec on Npc/Player [*]Custom Thieving Stalls [*]Slayer Shop / Pk Shop / Dominion Tower Shop / Agility Shop / Vote Point Shop / and more.[/ul]
[CENTER][spoiler=Pictures] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/6e401bb13f1dbd15a8c09ee1b47dd9ed.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/118d3d3b5be72c268744b7960f8b92d9.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/5ad558e03524c604f1fc33d9df55f6b7.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/356b99f10b4ef0ed86b7bb1c2255dfe6.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/da799c8272d0b4514bc26899a4e2f01e.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/0ed2194f8adb68c1658f4d7ae420b694.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/9f0b9ead4c89bc6a987c8746ed33e53a.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/bace24089b055f94df32643acc323503.png[/img] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/62cdd9c0eb5df299d65eade482f14df1.png[/img] [/spoiler][/CENTER]

[B][SIZE=2][COLOR="#009900"]Something about us:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]
Divine Revolution wasn’t built just to be a great server, we mainly focus on our community. A server can be well coded but without that special spark with the owner and his players whats the point? At Divine Revolution we ensure that our staff is on daily and seeing how our players are enjoying the server. Feel free to come on over to our server and check us out, hell you might even enjoy your stay!

[HR][/HR]

[SIZE=2][B][COLOR="#009900"]Server Features:[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE]

[ul][]Economy / PvP / PvM
[]Enjoyable Community / Friendly Owners
[]Built for a community not for money!
[]25 Working Skills - Including Construction, Summoning, and Dungeoneering.
[]Almost perfect combat system

[]12+ Hard Bosses (Many Drops)
[]Almost perfect skilling xp rates

[]Full Screen and perfect F keys

[]Custom Thieving Stalls
